item.description: Join us for dinner and drinks at the Aegean Restaurant, Framingham. This restaurant is known for its delicious food and great atmosphere. Meet new, friendly and interesting people and have a fun time relaxing and enjoying some great food. Everyone pays for their own food/drink. If you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000. Look forward to seeing you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside ent. If need to, please call 774 232 0000
item.name: Dinner and Drinks at the Aegean Restaurant, Framingham
